item.title: About
item.description: Noah is an offensive security engineer with experience red teaming at several Fortune 500 companies in software and financial industries. With varied experience leading and managing operations including social engineering and covert physical entry into office buildings to stealthily gaining access to high value financial systems, to troubleshooting corporate networks, to securing web and mobile applications, Noah has a strong track record of applying creative thinking and determination to solve challenging technical problems.
